reasons.optimizer: Adam is adaptive and generally performs well on image datasets.
reasons.learning_rate: A learning rate of 0.001 balances convergence speed and stability.
reasons.batch_size: Increasing to 32 can improve training stability and leverage GPU memory better.
reasons.epochs: Increasing to 150 allows more training time for the model to learn complex patterns.
reasons.weight_decay: Helps prevent overfitting by adding a penalty for large weights.
reasons.momentum: A momentum of 0.9 helps accelerate gradients vectors in the right directions.
reasons.dropout_rate: A dropout rate of 0.5 can help reduce overfitting.
reasons.label_smoothing: Helps improve model calibration and generalization.
reasons.scheduler: ReduceLROnPlateau adjusts the learning rate based on validation performance.
reasons.data_augmentation: Enhances the dataset and helps the model generalize better.
reasons.batch_normalization: Improves training speed and stability by normalizing layer inputs.
reasons.initialization: HeNormal is suitable for ReLU activations and helps with convergence.

recommendations.expected_improvement: Increase in accuracy to above 0.75 and reduction in validation loss.
